// GENERATED CODE - PLEASE DO NOT EDIT

    private final com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<Object, ${resultClassName}> mRoutine${methodCount};

    private com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.Routine<Object, ${resultClassName}> initRoutine${methodCount}(
            final com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.RoutineConfiguration configuration) {

        final com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.InvocationFactory<Object, ${resultClassName}> factory = new com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.InvocationFactory<Object, ${resultClassName}>() {

            @javax.annotation.Nonnull
            public com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.Invocation<Object, ${resultClassName}> newInvocation() {

                return new Invocation${methodCount}();
            }
        };
        final com.gh.bmd.jrt.builder.RoutineConfiguration routineConfiguration =
                configuration.builderFrom()
                             ${routineBuilderOptions}
                             .withInputSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                             .withInputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.time.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                             .withOutputSize(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
                             .withOutputTimeout(com.gh.bmd.jrt.time.TimeDuration.ZERO)
                             .buildConfiguration();
        return com.gh.bmd.jrt.core.JRoutine.on(factory)
                                           .withConfiguration(routineConfiguration)
                                           .buildRoutine();
    }
